TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TransformCollection extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.Transform>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Media.Transform>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Windows.Media.Transform>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the TransformCollection class provides several special features: TransformCollection objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMoreTransformKeyFrameObjectElements* One or more objects, declared using object element syntax.

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.TransformCollection CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property was .
